name: Carrenza
description: Carrenza is a cloud services provider that believes technology should make businesses better. We blend IaaS and PaaS capabilities to transform how our customers and partners consume and deliver applications. We are proud to count Royal Bank of Scotland and Government Digital Service amongst the many organisations that rely on us to deliver their business-critical applications.

locations.address: 6th Floor, Commodity Quay, St. Katharine Docks
